titleStmt.title: Digitus dei, or, A miraculous victory gained by the English upon the rebels in Munster exprest in two letters written to Lievtenant Colonell St.Leger, sonne and heire to the Right Honourable Sir William St. Leger, knight, late Lord president of Munster / by ... Richard Gething ; September 20, 1642.
titleStmt.author: Gething, Richard, 1585?-1652?
